name: Stop it (Nez)
description:
This is a 2D game I made for ScoreSpace gameJam #23.

PLAY IN FULL SCREEN!!!

In game you move with mouse and shoot with mouse click.

Try to stay alive as long as possible.

Game is built in 1920x1080 resolution so and has to be player in full screen so that you can see all the game scene.

I couldnt add a score system, sorry.

I didn't have time to add sound or art but at least it has some gameplay, so im happy with it. Im kinda new to game dev world but im proud of what i made in 3days :)
